frontmatter.title: Mercury 笔记：实现常数证明尺寸

children.value: Mercury [EG25] 是一个基于 KZG10 的多元线性多项式承诺方案，即 Prover 向 Verifier 证明一个

children.html: nnn
f~(X0,X1,…,Xn−1)\tilde{f}(X_0,X_1,\ldots,X_{n-1})f~​(X0​,X1​,…,Xn−1​)
u⃗=(u0,u1,…,un−1)\vec{u} = (u_0,u_1,\ldots,u_{n-1})u=(u0​,u1​,…,un−1​)
vvv
N=2nN = 2^nN=2n
f~\tilde{f}f~​
NNN

children.value: 。对比同样基于 KZG10 的 ph23 [PH23]、zeromorph [BCHO23]、gemini [KT23]方案，mercury 能在不牺牲 Prover 线性

children.html: O(N)O(N)O(N)

children.value: 的有限域运算的情况下，达到常数的证明尺寸，而非对数级别的

children.html: O(log⁡N)O(\log N)O(logN)

children.value: 。同期的研究工作 SamaritanPCS [GPS25] 也达到了这样的性能。这两个协议在思想上有类似的地方，它们都在基于 pairing 的多元线性多项式承诺方案的研究中取得了显著的突破。本系列文章将详细介绍 mercury 是如何做到这一点的。
mercury 能做到常数证明尺寸的核心在于其洞见了一元多项式分解与多元线性多项式求值之间的关系，能将一个一元多项式在一个随机点处的求值转换为一个多元线性多项式在一个点处的求值，该求值可以转换为常数证明尺寸的内积证明，而一元多项式的分解证明也只需要常数的证明尺寸。
mercury 协议的整体思路与 Hyrax [WTSTW16] 协议有一些类似，先将

children.html: f~\tilde{f}f~​
B={0,1}n\mathbf{B} = \{0,1\}^nB={0,1}n

N×N\sqrt{N} \times \sqrt{N}N​×N​

children.value: 中前半部分值求和，即先计算

children.html: h~(Xt,…,Xn−1):=f~(u0,…,ut−1,Xt,…,Xn−1)\tilde{h}(X_t, \ldots, X_{n - 1}):=\tilde{f}(u_0, \ldots, u_{t - 1}, X_t, \ldots, X_{n - 1})h~(Xt​,…,Xn−1​):=f~​(u0​,…,ut−1​,Xt​,…,Xn−1​)
h~(ut,…,un−1)=f~(u0,…,ut−1,ut,…,un−1)\tilde{h}(u_t, \ldots, u_{n - 1}) = \tilde{f}(u_0, \ldots, u_{t - 1}, u_t, \ldots, u_{n - 1})h~(ut​,…,un−1​)=f~​(u0​,…,ut−1​,ut​,…,un−1​)
vvv

children.value: 。这样分成两部分求和有一个好处，可以将计算的规模从原来的

children.html: NNN
N\sqrt{N}N​

children.value: 长，Prover 有一些计算复杂度原来是

children.html: Nlog⁡NN \log NNlogN

children.value: ，现在计算的规模变小后，计算复杂度最多达到

children.html: Nlog⁡N=O(N)\sqrt{N} \log \sqrt{N} = O(N)N​logN​=O(N)

children.value: ，这也是 mercury 能保持 Prover 线性

children.html: O(N)O(N)O(N)

children.value: 复杂度的一个重要原因。
多元线性多项式的表示

children.value: 对于一个多元线性多项式

children.value: 上的 Lagrange 插值函数，其具体表达式为
\tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(i),(X_0, X_1, \ldots, X_{n-1})) = \prod_{j = 0}^{n-1} ((1- i_j)(1- X_j) + i_j \cdot X_j)
children.html: eq~(bits(i),(X0,X1,…,Xn−1))=∏j=0n−1((1−ij)(1−Xj)+ij⋅Xj)\tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(i),(X_0, X_1, \ldots, X_{n-1})) = \prod_{j = 0}^{n-1} ((1- i_j)(1- X_j) + i_j \cdot X_j)eq~​(bits(i),(X0​,X1​,…,Xn−1​))=j=0∏n−1​((1−ij​)(1−Xj​)+ij​⋅Xj​)
(X0,X1,…,Xn−1)∈Bn(X_0, X_1, \ldots, X_{n-1}) \in \mathbf{B}_n(X0​,X1​,…,Xn−1​)∈Bn​
bits(i)=(X0,X1,…,Xn−1)\mathsf{bits}(i) = (X_0, X_1, \ldots, X_{n-1})bits(i)=(X0​,X1​,…,Xn−1​)

children.value: ，那么这两个向量的各个分量都是相等的，因此

bits(i)=((i0,…,it−1),(it,…,in−1))\mathsf{bits}(i) = ((i_0,\ldots,i_{t-1}), (i_t,\ldots,i_{n-1}))bits(i)=((i0​,…,it−1​),(it​,…,in−1​))
(X0,X1,…,Xn−1)(X_0, X_1, \ldots, X_{n-1})(X0​,X1​,…,Xn−1​)

(X0,X1,…,Xn−1)=((X0,…,Xt−1),(Xt,…,Xn−1)):=(X⃗1,X⃗2)(X_0, X_1, \ldots, X_{n-1}) = ((X_0, \ldots, X_{t-1}), (X_t, \ldots, X_{n-1})) := (\vec{X}_1, \vec{X}_2)(X0​,X1​,…,Xn−1​)=((X0​,…,Xt−1​),(Xt​,…,Xn−1​)):=(X1​,X2​)

eq~(bits(i),(X0,X1,…,Xn−1))=∏j=0n−1((1−ij)(1−Xj)+ij⋅Xj)=(∏j=0t−1((1−ij)(1−Xj)+ij⋅Xj))⋅(∏j=tn−1((1−ij)(1−Xj)+ij⋅Xj))=eq~((i0,…,it−1),X⃗1)⋅eq~((it,…,in−1),X⃗2)\begin{align} \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(i),(X_0, X_1, \ldots, X_{n-1})) & = \prod_{j = 0}^{n-1} ((1- i_j)(1- X_j) + i_j \cdot X_j) \\ & = \left(\prod_{j = 0}^{t-1} ((1- i_j)(1- X_j) + i_j \cdot X_j) \right) \cdot \left(\prod_{j = t}^{n-1} ((1- i_j)(1- X_j) + i_j \cdot X_j) \right) \\ & = \tilde{eq}((i_0,\ldots,i_{t-1}),\vec{X}_1) \cdot \tilde{eq}((i_t,\ldots,i_{n-1}),\vec{X}_2) \end{align}eq~​(bits(i),(X0​,X1​,…,Xn−1​))​=j=0∏n−1​((1−ij​)(1−Xj​)+ij​⋅Xj​)=(j=0∏t−1​((1−ij​)(1−Xj​)+ij​⋅Xj​))⋅(j=t∏n−1​((1−ij​)(1−Xj​)+ij​⋅Xj​))=eq~​((i0​,…,it−1​),X1​)⋅eq~​((it​,…,in−1​),X2​)​​

children.value: 组，用两个下脚标进行表示

children.html: (f0,f1,…,f2n−1)=(f0,0,f0,1,…,f0,b−1,…,fb−1,0,…,fb−1,b−1)(f_0,f_1, \ldots, f_{2^n - 1}) = (f_{0,0}, f_{0,1}, \ldots, f_{0,b-1}, \ldots, f_{b-1,0}, \ldots, f_{b-1,b-1})(f0​,f1​,…,f2n−1​)=(f0,0​,f0,1​,…,f0,b−1​,…,fb−1,0​,…,fb−1,b−1​)

Mf=[f0,0f0,1⋯f0,b−1f1,0f1,1⋯f1,b−1⋮⋮ ⋮fb−1,0fb−1,1⋯fb−1,b−1]M_f = \begin{bmatrix} f_{0,0} & f_{0,1} & \cdots & f_{0,b-1} \\ f_{1,0} & f_{1,1} & \cdots & f_{1,b-1} \\ \vdots & \vdots & \ & \vdots \\ f_{b-1,0} & f_{b-1,1} & \cdots & f_{b-1,b-1} \end{bmatrix}Mf​=⎣⎡​f0,0​f1,0​⋮fb−1,0​​f0,1​f1,1​⋮fb−1,1​​⋯⋯ ⋯​f0,b−1​f1,b−1​⋮fb−1,b−1​​⎦⎤​
eq~\tilde{eq}eq~​

children.value: 函数可以进行分解，可以得到

children.html: f~(u⃗1,u⃗2)=∑i=02n−1fi⋅eq~(bits(i),(u⃗1,u⃗2))=∑i=02t−1∑j=02t−1fi,j⋅eq~((bits(j),bits(i)),(u⃗1,u⃗2))=∑i=02t−1∑j=02t−1fi,j⋅eq~(bits(j),u⃗1)⋅eq~(bits(i),u⃗2)=∑i=02t−1(eq~(bits(i),u⃗2)⋅(∑j=02t−1fi,j⋅eq~(bits(j),u⃗1)))\begin{align} \tilde{f}(\vec{u}_1, \vec{u}_2) & = \sum_{i=0}^{2^n - 1} f_i \cdot \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(i),(\vec{u}_1, \vec{u}_2)) \\ & = \sum_{i=0}^{2^t - 1} \sum_{j=0}^{2^t - 1} f_{i,j} \cdot \tilde{eq}((\mathsf{bits}(j),\mathsf{bits}(i)),(\vec{u}_1, \vec{u}_2))\\ & = \sum_{i=0}^{2^t - 1} \sum_{j=0}^{2^t - 1} f_{i,j} \cdot \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(j),\vec{u}_1) \cdot \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(i),\vec{u}_2) \\ & = \sum_{i=0}^{2^t - 1} \left(\tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(i),\vec{u}_2) \cdot\left(\sum_{j=0}^{2^t - 1} f_{i,j} \cdot \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(j),\vec{u}_1) \right) \right) \end{align}f~​(u1​,u2​)​=i=0∑2n−1​fi​⋅eq~​(bits(i),(u1​,u2​))=i=0∑2t−1​j=0∑2t−1​fi,j​⋅eq~​((bits(j),bits(i)),(u1​,u2​))=i=0∑2t−1​j=0∑2t−1​fi,j​⋅eq~​(bits(j),u1​)⋅eq~​(bits(i),u2​)=i=0∑2t−1​⎝⎛​eq~​(bits(i),u2​)⋅⎝⎛​j=0∑2t−1​fi,j​⋅eq~​(bits(j),u1​)⎠⎞​⎠⎞​​​

children.value: 上面的形式用矩阵表示更为直观，

children.html: f~(u⃗1,u⃗2)=[eq~(bits(0),u⃗2)eq~(bits(1),u⃗2)⋯eq~(bits(b−1),u⃗2)][f0,0f0,1⋯f0,b−1f1,0f1,1⋯f1,b−1⋮⋮ ⋮fb−1,0fb−1,1⋯fb−1,b−1][eq~(bits(0),u⃗1)eq~(bits(1),u⃗1)⋯eq~(bits(b−1),u⃗1)]=△v⃗2⊺⋅(Mf⋅v⃗1)\begin{align} & \tilde{f}(\vec{u}_1, \vec{u}_2) \\ & =\begin{bmatrix} \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(0), \vec{u}_2) & \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(1), \vec{u}_2) & \cdots & \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(b-1), \vec{u}_2) \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} f_{0,0} & f_{0,1} & \cdots & f_{0,b-1} \\ f_{1,0} & f_{1,1} & \cdots & f_{1,b-1} \\ \vdots & \vdots & \ & \vdots \\ f_{b-1,0} & f_{b-1,1} & \cdots & f_{b-1,b-1} \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(0), \vec{u}_1) \\ \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(1), \vec{u}_1) \\ \cdots \\ \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(b-1), \vec{u}_1) \end{bmatrix} \\ & \stackrel{\triangle}{=} \vec{v}_2^{\intercal} \cdot (M_f \cdot \vec{v}_1) \end{align}​f~​(u1​,u2​)=[eq~​(bits(0),u2​)​eq~​(bits(1),u2​)​⋯​eq~​(bits(b−1),u2​)​]⎣⎡​f0,0​f1,0​⋮fb−1,0​​f0,1​f1,1​⋮fb−1,1​​⋯⋯ ⋯​f0,b−1​f1,b−1​⋮fb−1,b−1​​⎦⎤​⎣⎡​eq~​(bits(0),u1​)eq~​(bits(1),u1​)⋯eq~​(bits(b−1),u1​)​⎦⎤​=△v2⊺​⋅(Mf​⋅v1​)​​
n=2n = 2n=2

children.value: 。下面先引入多元线性多项式到一元多项式的转换，再借助于一元多项式的承诺方案 KZG10 来进行证明。
从多元线性多项式到一元多项式

children.label: 从多元线性多项式到一元多项式

children.html: f~(X0,X1,…,Xn−1)=∑i=02n−1fi⋅eq~(bits(i),(X0,X1,…,Xn−1))\tilde{f}(X_0,X_1,\ldots, X_{n-1}) = \sum_{i=0}^{2^n - 1} f_i \cdot \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(i),(X_0, X_1, \ldots, X_{n-1}))f~​(X0​,X1​,…,Xn−1​)=i=0∑2n−1​fi​⋅eq~​(bits(i),(X0​,X1​,…,Xn−1​))
Bn\mathbf{B}_nBn​
fif_ifi​

children.value: 直接作为一元多项式的系数，得到其对应的一元多项式为

children.html: f(X)=∑i=02n−1fi⋅Xif(X) = \sum_{i = 0}^{2^n - 1} f_i \cdot X^if(X)=i=0∑2n−1​fi​⋅Xi

children.value: 对于任意的一个多元线性多项式，都按照这种方式对应到一元多项式，即将多元线性多项式在 boolean hypercube 上的取值直接作为一元多项式的系数。

children.html: n=2n = 2n=2

children.value: 为例，多元线性多项式到一元多项式的转换，可以理解为只是变换了不同的基，多元线性多项式的基为 Lagrange 基，

children.html: (eq~(bits(0),X⃗),eq~(bits(1),X⃗),eq~(bits(2),X⃗),eq~(bits(3),X⃗))(\tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(0), \vec{X}), \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(1), \vec{X}), \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(2), \vec{X}), \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(3), \vec{X}))(eq~​(bits(0),X),eq~​(bits(1),X),eq~​(bits(2),X),eq~​(bits(3),X))
(1,X,X2,X3)(1, X, X^2, X^3)(1,X,X2,X3)
h~(X⃗2)=f~(u⃗1,X⃗2)\tilde{h}(\vec{X}_2) = \tilde{f}(\vec{u}_1, \vec{X}_2)h~(X2​)=f~​(u1​,X2​)

h~(X⃗2)=f~(u⃗1,X⃗2)=[eq~(bits(0),X⃗2)eq~(bits(1),X⃗2)⋯eq~(bits(b−1),X⃗2)][f0,0f0,1⋯f0,b−1f1,0f1,1⋯f1,b−1⋮⋮ ⋮fb−1,0fb−1,1⋯fb−1,b−1][eq~(bits(0),u⃗1)eq~(bits(1),u⃗1)⋯eq~(bits(b−1),u⃗1)]=[eq~(bits(0),X⃗2)eq~(bits(1),X⃗2)⋯eq~(bits(b−1),X⃗2)][f0,0⋅eq~(bits(0),u⃗1)+f0,1⋅eq~(bits(1),u⃗1)+…+f0,b−1⋅eq~(bits(b−1),u⃗1)f1,0⋅eq~(bits(0),u⃗1)+f1,1⋅eq~(bits(1),u⃗1)+…+f1,b−1⋅eq~(bits(b−1),u⃗1)⋮fb−1,0⋅eq~(bits(0),u⃗1)+fb−1,1⋅eq~(bits(1),u⃗1)+…+fb−1,b−1⋅eq~(bits(b−1),u⃗1)]\begin{align} & \tilde{h}(\vec{X}_2) = \tilde{f}(\vec{u}_1, \vec{X}_2) \\ & =\begin{bmatrix} \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(0), \vec{X}_2) & \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(1), \vec{X}_2) & \cdots & \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(b-1), \vec{X}_2) \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} f_{0,0} & f_{0,1} & \cdots & f_{0,b-1} \\ f_{1,0} & f_{1,1} & \cdots & f_{1,b-1} \\ \vdots & \vdots & \ & \vdots \\ f_{b-1,0} & f_{b-1,1} & \cdots & f_{b-1,b-1} \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(0), \vec{u}_1) \\ \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(1), \vec{u}_1) \\ \cdots \\ \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(b-1), \vec{u}_1) \end{bmatrix} \\ & = \begin{bmatrix} \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(0), \vec{X}_2) & \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(1), \vec{X}_2) & \cdots & \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(b-1), \vec{X}_2) \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} f_{0,0} \cdot \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(0), \vec{u}_1) + f_{0,1} \cdot \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(1), \vec{u}_1) + \ldots + f_{0,b-1} \cdot \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(b-1), \vec{u}_1)\\ f_{1,0} \cdot \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(0), \vec{u}_1) + f_{1,1} \cdot \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(1), \vec{u}_1) + \ldots + f_{1,b-1} \cdot \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(b-1), \vec{u}_1) \\ \vdots \\ f_{b-1,0} \cdot \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(0), \vec{u}_1) + f_{b-1,1} \cdot \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(1), \vec{u}_1) + \ldots + f_{b-1,b-1} \cdot \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(b-1), \vec{u}_1) \end{bmatrix} \end{align}​h~(X2​)=f~​(u1​,X2​)=[eq~​(bits(0),X2​)​eq~​(bits(1),X2​)​⋯​eq~​(bits(b−1),X2​)​]⎣⎡​f0,0​f1,0​⋮fb−1,0​​f0,1​f1,1​⋮fb−1,1​​⋯⋯ ⋯​f0,b−1​f1,b−1​⋮fb−1,b−1​​⎦⎤​⎣⎡​eq~​(bits(0),u1​)eq~​(bits(1),u1​)⋯eq~​(bits(b−1),u1​)​⎦⎤​=[eq~​(bits(0),X2​)​eq~​(bits(1),X2​)​⋯​eq~​(bits(b−1),X2​)​]⎣⎡​f0,0​⋅eq~​(bits(0),u1​)+f0,1​⋅eq~​(bits(1),u1​)+…+f0,b−1​⋅eq~​(bits(b−1),u1​)f1,0​⋅eq~​(bits(0),u1​)+f1,1​⋅eq~​(bits(1),u1​)+…+f1,b−1​⋅eq~​(bits(b−1),u1​)⋮fb−1,0​⋅eq~​(bits(0),u1​)+fb−1,1​⋅eq~​(bits(1),u1​)+…+fb−1,b−1​⋅eq~​(bits(b−1),u1​)​⎦⎤​​​

children.value:
\begin{align}
f(X)  & = \sum_{i = 0}^{2^n - 1} f_i \cdot X^i = \sum_{i = 0}^{b - 1} \sum_{j = 0}^{b - 1} f_{i,j} \cdot X^{i \cdot b + j} \\
 & = \sum_{i = 0}^{b - 1} \sum_{j = 0}^{b - 1} f_{i,j} \cdot (X^{b})^i \cdot X^{j}  \\
& = \sum_{j = 0}^{b - 1} \sum_{i = 0}^{b - 1} f_{i,j} \cdot (X^{b})^i \cdot X^{j} \\
& = \sum_{j = 0}^{b - 1} f_j(X^b) \cdot X^j \\
& = \sum_{i = 0}^{b - 1} f_i(X^b) \cdot X^i
\end{align}

children.value: 个变量的多元线性多项式在某个点的打开值，这可以转换为内积证明，例如对于多元线性多项式

children.html: g~\tilde{g}g~​

g~(u⃗1)=∑i=0b−1eq~(bits(i),u⃗1)⋅fi(α)\begin{align} \tilde{g}(\vec{u}_1) & = \sum_{i = 0}^{b - 1} \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(i), \vec{u}_1) \cdot f_i(\alpha) \\ \end{align}g~​(u1​)​=i=0∑b−1​eq~​(bits(i),u1​)⋅fi​(α)​​

children.value: 上面其实计算的是向量

children.html: a⃗1=(eq~(bits(0),u⃗1),…,eq~(bits(b−1),u⃗1)\vec{a}_1 = (\tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(0),\vec{u}_1),\ldots, \tilde{eq}(\mathsf{bits}(b-1), \vec{u}_1)a1​=(eq~​(bits(0),u1​),…,eq~​(bits(b−1),u1​)
b⃗1=(f0(α),…,fb−1(α))\vec{b}_1 = (f_0(\alpha),\ldots, f_{b-1}(\alpha))b1​=(f0​(α),…,fb−1​(α))
h~(u⃗2)\tilde{h}(\vec{u}_2)h~(u2​)

children.value: 也是类似的，这样第三项和第四项就能转换为两个内积证明，而这两个内积证明又能用随机数聚合成一个证明，也能达到常数的证明大小。
因此，mercury 的这四部分证明都是常数的证明大小，同时由于证明第三项和第四项的多元线性多项式的长度为

children.html: bbb

children.value: ，就算有些计算 Prover 需要

children.html: O(blog⁡b)O(b \log b)O(blogb)

children.value: 的复杂度，这也是不超过

children.html: O(N)O(N)O(N)

children.value: 的复杂度，依然能够保持 Prover 线性的计算复杂度。
本文介绍了 mercury 能在保持 Prover 线性复杂度下实现常数证明尺寸的原因，在下一篇文章中将详细介绍 mercury 是如何证明这四项的。
[EG25] Eagen, Liam, and Ariel Gabizon. “MERCURY: A multilinear Polynomial Commitment Scheme with constant proof size and no prover FFTs.” Cryptology ePrint Archive (2025).
[GPS25] Ganesh, Chaya, Sikhar Patranabis, and Nitin Singh. “Samaritan: Linear-time Prover SNARK from New Multilinear Polynomial Commitments.”
[PH23] Papini, Shahar, and Ulrich Haböck. “Improving logarithmic derivative lookups using GKR.” Cryptology ePrint Archive (2023).
[BCHO23] Bootle, Jonathan, Alessandro Chiesa, Yuncong Hu, and Michele Orru. “Gemini: Elastic SNARKs for diverse environments.” In
Annual International Conference on the Theory and Applications of Cryptographic Techniques
[KT23] Kohrita, Tohru, and Patrick Towa. “Zeromorph: Zero-knowledge multilinear-evaluation proofs from homomorphic univariate commitments.” Cryptology ePrint Archive (2023).

[WTSTW16] Riad S. Wahby, Ioanna Tzialla, abhi shelat, Justin Thaler, and Michael Walfish. “Doubly-efficient zkSNARKs without trusted setup.”  In 2018 IEEE Symposium on Security and Privacy (SP), pp. 926-943. IEEE, 2018.
